msItem.title: Khizanah-i 'Amirah.
msItem.note: Missing some foios at end; the text breaks off in the notice on Hilali. Inside front cover, pasted slip: Lieut. Col. briggs. Biographical notices of and selections from Persian Poets. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: The body of the work is preceded by a list of contents, apparently arranged by folio numbers, though the numbers are missing, presumably trimmed off in rebinding. Plain red leather binding, European style.

acquisition.p: Presented by Col. Briggs. (So in additional note in Morley, confirmed by the bookplate).

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: Notices on and selections from Persian poets.
